channel.title: Court Wizard Bypass Redirect
channel.description:
Ok so, I was Court Wizard, and I first barriered 13, and was redirected to 7, but I still successfully protected 13.
![59 PM|690x149](upload://AoXPO9CsXlDcxyoJhMHzKZGm528.png)
And then the same thing happened later when I barriered 14, got redirected to 5, but still successfully protected 14.
![15 PM|690x329](upload://v1QhdC6w8Tjk11mBfVcoavxl839.png)
Steps to reproduce:
- Be a Court Wizard - Choose to Barrier someone - Get Redirected by Drunk, Court Wizard, Sage, Ritualist, etc. - Have your original target be effected by a negative effect - Successfully protect your OG target

item.title: Court Wizard Bypass Redirect
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Ok so, I was Court Wizard, and I first barriered 13, and was redirected to 7, but I still successfully protected 13.

And then the same thing happened later when I barriered 14, got redirected to 5, but still successfully protected 14.

Steps to reproduce:

  • Be a Court Wizard
  • Choose to Barrier someone
  • Get Redirected by Drunk, Court Wizard, Sage, Ritualist, etc.
  • Have your original target be effected by a negative effect
  • Successfully protect your OG target

Read full topic
